title: Large Print Sudoku Masters: Volume 2
subtitle: Gentle Progress - Building Confidence with Easy-Medium Puzzles
author: Igor Ganapolsky
description: Take the next step in your cognitive wellness journey with 100 progressively challenging large print Sudoku puzzles. This volume bridges beginner and intermediate levels, helping you build confidence and mental agility while maintaining the visual accessibility features that make puzzle-solving a pleasure, not a strain.
categories: Crafts, Hobbies & Home > Games & Activities > Puzzles > Sudoku
Health, Fitness & Dieting > Mental Health > Dementia
target_audience: Seniors, vision-impaired adults, intermediate puzzle solvers
back_cover_description:
Large Print Sudoku Masters
Volume 2: Gentle Progress
